name: Scevus
description:
A retro style bullet-hell arcade game where rooms modify changing their shape and enemies change their form becoming stronger over time.

Features:

-disappearing/appearing walls

-smooth player controls

-enemies that die in one hit

-slow bullets

-some controller support

Scevus is based on being minimalistic while still being fun with the player only being able to move around and there only being one kind of enemy.

Note: It is recommended to play Scevus with a screen refresh rate of at least 60hz
